meanings.sent1: The players were tired after the postgame celebration.

meanings.definition: The period of time following a game.
meanings.sent1: Fans gathered outside the stadium during the postgame.
meanings.sent2: The postgame can be just as exciting as the game itself.
meanings.sent3: The postgame traffic made it hard to leave the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: In the postgame, emotions were running high among the supporters.
meanings.sent5: The postgame interviews with the players revealed their thoughts on the match.

meanings.definition: A discussion or analysis of a game that has just ended.
meanings.sent1: The coach led a detailed postgame with the team.
meanings.sent2: The postgame often reveals key insights into the players' performance.
meanings.sent3: During the postgame, the commentators shared their opinions on the match.
meanings.sent4: The postgame breakdown highlighted the strengths and weaknesses of each team.
meanings.sent5: The postgame debate among fans was lively and engaging.
